approach.page_subtitle: A systematic, rules-based investment process combining factor-based stock selection, regime-aware allocation, and rigorous out-of-sample validation.
philosophy_paragraphs: We believe that markets reward certain persistent risk premia — momentum, value, quality, and low volatility — that can be harvested systematically. Rather than relying on human judgement or conviction-based stock picking, we use a quantitative model that ranks stocks on 13 measurable factors and constructs portfolios purely based on data.

Equally important is knowing when to invest. Our regime detection ensemble continuously monitors market conditions and adjusts the portfolio's allocation between equities, gold, and debt. This reduces drawdowns without sacrificing long-term returns.

Every aspect of our methodology is walk-forward validated — we never use future data to make past decisions. This discipline ensures that our track record reflects what an investor would have actually experienced, not an optimised backtest.

approach.regime_subtitle: A multi-signal ensemble detects market regimes on a continuous scale. The allocation between equities, gold, and debt shifts dynamically based on regime conviction.
approach.allocation_chart_subtitle: Dynamic allocation across equities, gold, and debt based on regime confidence score. Each bar represents a monthly rebalance point.
approach.wf_section_subtitle: The strongest test of any investment strategy is whether it works on data it has never seen. We use walk-forward validation — the gold standard in systematic trading research.
approach.wf_description: How it works: In each window, the model optimises factor weights on the training data (2 years), then applies those weights to the subsequent test period (6 months) that it has never seen. The portfolio track record is built entirely from these test periods — none of the reported returns come from in-sample data.
approach.wf_survivorship: Survivorship bias elimination: At each point in time, the stock universe is reconstructed from official NSE constituent PDFs. We maintain 96 point-in-time snapshots covering 338 unique stocks, ensuring that only stocks that were actually in the index at that time are considered.

about.page_subtitle: Quantitative research meets disciplined portfolio management. Built on data, validated by rigour.
firm_description: EFP Wealth is a quantitative portfolio management firm focused on Indian equities. We apply systematic, factor-based strategies to construct concentrated portfolios that aim to deliver superior risk-adjusted returns over market cycles.

Our edge is not a secret formula — it is process. Every decision in our investment pipeline is rules-based, testable, and reproducible. We publish our methodology transparently because we believe that honest performance speaks louder than marketing narratives.
We serve a select group of qualified investors who value rigorous research, transparent reporting, and a long-term orientation over short-term performance chasing.

principles.title: Honest Validation
principles.description: We test strategies on data they have never seen. Walk-forward validation prevents overfitting and ensures the track record is genuine.

principles.title: Risk Before Return
principles.description: Regime-aware allocation prioritises capital preservation. We would rather underperform in euphoria than suffer catastrophic loss in a crisis.

principles.title: Radical Transparency
